Book Guido
Meet Guido

Hi, I'm Guido 👋

I'm a cognitive psychologist focussed on E-commerce in general and the Spryker platform specifically. I build teams that turn user data & insights into continuous business growth. I speak around the world, building an engaged community and helping businesses to go beyond.

Follow me on LinkedIn Book me for your event

Content

What can you find here?

Podcasts

Podcasting is a great way to learn, share and get to know people. I've published over 250 episodes for different podcasts.

Events

I've had the privilege of speaking at a number of wonderful industry conferences and universities around the world, sharing my experience with the audience and sharing ideas with a lot of experts.

Articles

I provide actionable tips on improving your online business and boosting conversion rates.

Presentations

Overview of public presentations with decks and videos (when available).
Skills

How can I help?

Let me help your business.

Conversion optimization

I can help you set up, run experiments, analyze data, and glean insights about your customers that can be turned into actionable strategies​.

Presentations

As an international speaker and AWARD WINNING Podcast host, I'm available to inspire your audience at seminars or give workshops for your employees. I've been acknowledged as a highly engaging speaker at various events.

Expert Reviews

I provide actionable tips on improving your online business and boosting conversion rates.

Training & Workshops

I can guide your team to form a ‘customer intelligence team’ and embed a continuous optimization strategy within your organization​

Lunch

Interested in discussing your case or exchanging thoughts over lunch? I'm usually around Amsterdam or Berlin and would love to hear from you

Questions

Contact me and we can have a look at what I can do for your business.

In need of a keynote speaker or in-house workshop?
